generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved street with multiple lanes, road markings including a crosswalk and bicycle lane, and vehicles driving on it.
- sidewalk: A pedestrian walkway is visible along the right side of the road, separated from the road by a curb and lined with buildings.
- building: Multiple brick and other types of buildings line both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including utility poles and streetlight poles.
- traffic sign: A "No Parking" sign is visible on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Bare trees are visible along the left side of the street.
- sky: The clear blue sky is visible above the buildings and street.
- person: A person is walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road, carrying a bag.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road and parked along the sides.
- truck: A truck is visible in the distance on the road.
